statements: SELECT * FROM customer_profile ORDER BY customer_id ASC, age DESC
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customer_profile WHERE age > 30
SELECT * FROM customer_profile WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customer_profile ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customer_profile WHERE location LIKE '%York%'
SELECT * FROM customer_profile WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_profile WHERE location='New York'
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customer_profile WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40
SELECT * FROM customer_profile WHERE gender='Male' AND location='California' ORDER BY age ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM customer_profile WHERE gender='Female'
SELECT * FROM customer_profile;
SELECT name, age, location FROM customer_profile WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, budget FROM marketing_campaign ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, age, gender, location FROM customer_profile WHERE age > 25;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM marketing_campaign WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customer_profile WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT customer_id, name, location FROM customer_profile WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaign WHERE start_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY budget DESC
SELECT * FROM customer_profile WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT campaign_id, end_date FROM marketing_campaign WHERE budget > 5000
SELECT * FROM customer_profile WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT customer_id, age, location FROM customer_profile ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT customer_id, location FROM customer_profile WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM marketing_campaign WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(purchase_amount) AS max_purchase_amount FROM purchase_history GROUP BY customer_id HAVING max_purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_profile WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT count(*) FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_profile INNER JOIN purchase_history ON customer_profile.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_type, start_date FROM marketing_campaign WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_profile;
SELECT id, name, age, location FROM customer_profile WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT purchase_id, product_name, purchase_date FROM purchase_history ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_age_range, campaign_start_date FROM marketing_campaign WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT result_id, conversion_rate, revenue_generated FROM campaign_results WHERE campaign_status='Successful';
SELECT * FROM customer_profile WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT name, age, location FROM customer_profile WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT cp.name, ph.product_name, ph.purchase_amount FROM customer_profile cp JOIN purchase_history ph ON cp.id = ph.customer_id WHERE ph.purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY ph.purchase_amount DESC;

SELECT mc.campaign_name, cr.revenue_generated, cr.conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaign mc JOIN campaign_results cr ON mc.campaign_id = cr.campaign_id WHERE cr.campaign_status = 'Success' ORDER BY cr.revenue_generated DESC;

SELECT cp.name, ph.product_name, DATE_PART('year', ph.purchase_date) AS purchase_year FROM customer_profile cp JOIN purchase_history ph ON cp.id = ph.customer_id WHERE purchase_year = 2022 ORDER BY cp.name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_profile;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_profile WHERE age > 30;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_id, target_name FROM campaign_target ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_name = 'category';
SELECT * FROM customer_profile WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_profile WHERE location = 'New York' AND age > 25;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 500 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
